tool_description: Verifies availability and condition of photography equipment for wedding events, tracking serial numbers and last maintenance dates.

equipment_types.description: Types of equipment to check (camera, lens, flash, tripod, etc.)

event_date.description: Date and time of the wedding event

error_messages: Empty equipment list: Provide at least one equipment type to check.
Invalid event date: Event date must be in the future and in ISO 8601 format.
Unknown equipment type: Use recognized equipment categories like camera, lens, flash, tripod, lighting, battery, memory_card.
usage: Specify the types of equipment needed and the event date. The tool will check inventory availability and condition status for the requested items.

available_items.description: List of available equipment with serial numbers

unavailable_items.description: List of equipment currently unavailable or in maintenance

condition_status.description: Overall condition assessment of available equipment
